participant_1.name: Chloe
participant_1.personality: Confident and outgoing, often concerned with appearances and social status.
participant_1.background: i like to tan in tanning beds. i'm high maintenance. i diet a lot. i love spending money. i love listening to britney spears.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Hardworking and practical, enjoys hands-on activities and values personal connections.
participant_2.background: i just got a job working in a gas station. i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates.
